Email

If you are having any issues with Companion, either through the server or a local installation, feel free to email us at:
iii-companion@glasgow.ac.uk.

Location

  • Institute of Infection, Immunity and Inflammation
  • College of Medical, Veterinary and Life Sciences
  • University of Glasgow
  • Sir Graeme Davies Building
  • 120 University Place
  • Glasgow G12 8TA
  • Companion was first developed in 2015 by the Parasite Genomics group at the Wellcome Sanger Institute.
  • Ongoing development has been carried out by the biottofni group at the University of Glasgow since 2017.
